mapper.select: SELECT TITLE, CONTENT FROM FAQ ORDER BY NO

SELECT Q.NO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.ANSWER, MI.NICK, Q.ADMIN_NO, Q.MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(Q.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(Q.ANSWER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ANSWER_DATE, Q.DELETE_YN, Q.EDIT_DATE, Q.COUNT, IT.TYPE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER_INFO MI ON Q.MEMBER_NO = MI.NO LEFT JOIN INQUIRY_TYPE IT ON Q.TYPE = IT.NO WHERE Q.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND Q.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND IT.TYPE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND MI.NICK LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND (Q.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR Q.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR MI.NICK LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR IT.TYPE LIKE '%${searchValue}%')
ORDER BY Q.NO DESC
SELECT NO, TYPE FROM INQUIRY_TYPE ORDER BY NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
UPDATE QNA SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE QNA SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, T.* FROM (SELECT Q.NO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.ANSWER, Q.ADMIN_NO, Q.MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(Q.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(Q.ANSWER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ANSWER_DATE, Q.DELETE_YN, Q.EDIT_DATE, Q.COUNT, IT.TYPE FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN INQUIRY_TYPE IT ON Q.TYPE = IT.NO WHERE Q.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND Q.MEMBER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY Q.ENROLL_DATE DESC) T

SELECT COUNT (Q.NO) FROM QNA Q
WHERE TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' AND Q.DELETE_YN = 'N'
INNER JOIN INQUIRY_TYPE IT ON Q.TYPE = IT.NO WHERE IT.TYPE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' AND Q.DELETE_YN = 'N'
INNER JOIN MEMBER_INFO MI ON Q.MEMBER_NO = MI.NO WHERE MI.NICK LIKE '%${searchValue}%' AND Q.DELETE_YN = 'N'
INNER JOIN MEMBER_INFO MI ON Q.MEMBER_NO = MI.NO INNER JOIN INQUIRY_TYPE IT ON Q.TYPE = IT.NO WHERE (Q.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR Q.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR MI.NICK LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR IT.TYPE LIKE '%${searchValue}%') AND Q.DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM QNA WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
